class.name: MeasurerSet
class.comment: A set of measurers which work together

list.name: additionalMeasurers
list.comment: Additional measurers to be used. Started in the order they appear. Stopped in reverse order

list.name: validationMeasurers
list.comment: Validation measurers. Started in the order they appear. Stopped in reverse order. Started before warming/clearing caches
